title: Chef
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
· Experience in cooking South indian food like idly,dosi & Meals Etc.
· Ability to follow SOP’s and detailed recipes.
· Knowledge of varieties of Indian Spice.
· Follow the Instructions of Head Cook and able to work with team Member.
· Ensure the food quality and the presentation.
· Ensure the prompt and speedy delivery of orders.
· Receiving goods after checking the quality and quantity.
· Storage of raw materials and ingredients appropriately.
· Check the quality of raw and cooked food products to ensure the standards.
· Ensure personal hygiene and safety requirements.
· Ensure the cleanliness of the kitchen, cooking utensils, and equipment.
· Must be able to work on weekends and public holidays.
· Able to work well under pressure in a fast-paced environment.

title: CHEF
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
In charge of the daily work and ordering for the assigned section.
Need to get up early to prepare soup etc.
Carry out given recipes and instructions with precision speedy.
Ensure strict health and hygiene practices.
Cleaning, organize and taking care of kitchen equipment as per instruction manuals.
Monitoring food portion and waste to maintain profit margin.
Following safety and precautions in all daily activities (carrying heavy load, sharp objects, hot objects etc.)
Preferably Junior Executive specialized in Food/Beverage/Restaurant Service or equivalent.
Must be able to work night shift and split shift
Must be able to work extra hours if needed

title: Sous Chef (Deputy Chef)
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:
· Working closely with the manager in all aspects of kitchen management
· Supervising and leading the kitchen team
· Delegating roles and responsibilities to the cooks
· Maintain cleanliness and implement hygiene standards of food safety and regulations
· Monitor restaurant performance and make recommendations for menus and management procedures
· Ensure a high quality of foods and presentations are provided at all times
· Other duties assigned by higher management

Requirements:
· Must possess at least Professional Certificate/Nitec, Diploma/Advanced in Food & Beverage Services Management or equivalent.
· Min 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field
· Strong in culinary background.
· Enjoys planning, organizing, and problem-solving
· Displays curiosity and takes time to learn and understand new culinary trends
· Demonstrate excellent leadership skills

Location: Town area

title: Senior Sous Chef (Head Chef)
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Job Description:
· Ensure the quality of food provided is of the highest standards
· To monitor inventory, estimate food consumption, place orders with suppliers, and schedule delivery of fresh food and beverages.
· Supervise the daily operation of the kitchen i.e. portion/quality control of food.
· Create new menu items and prices based on analysis.
· Enhance the Quality Management System and Food Safety Management System.
· Monitor revenues, and expenses and optimize profitability
· Arrange for maintenance and repair of equipment and other services when required.
· Optimize manpower with proper planning allocations.
· Recruit, hire, and oversee training for staff.
· Resolve customer complaints about food quality or service in a professional manner.
· Maintain and implement hygiene standards

Responsibilities:
· Minimum 10 years experience in a dining environment.
· Excellent knowledge and a passion for culinary and industry trends.
· Exceptional leadership to lead, manage, train, and motivate staff.
· Able to multi-task, flexible, adaptable, problem solver, and able to work in a fast environment.
· Willing to work 6 days of shift work including weekends and Public holidays.

Location: Town area

title: Pastry Chef (Baker)
address: KIM KEAT VIEW, 194 KIM KEAT AVENUE 310194
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Are you looking for a dynamic environment that empowers you to make a positive impact and bring smiles to people's faces? The Frosted Chick is a wholly local boutique bakery specialising in unique bakes for all occasions and we are looking to expand our team!
If you have a bubbly personality and enjoy making people's day, we want to invite you to join our energetic organisation.
Job scope includes
1) Baking of desserts in all forms
2) Face-to-face interaction
3) Troubleshooting and product enhancement
4) Stock and Inventory management
5) Team player and vibrant personality

title: Chef De Partie
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Tipsy Collective has a new concept opening in Sofitel Hotel located at Tanjong Pagar. If you are keen to join a new concept within Tipsy Collective, this is your chance now!

Tipsy Collective is a multi-concept holding group led by a team of passionate individuals who seek to present hospitality uniquely through a series of thoughtful concepts. Crafting experiences is what drives us at Tipsy Collective, we do so with carefully curated elements through Live Entertainment, Gourmet Food and Premium Drinks. More importantly, each concept has a convivial core and an element of fun.
Set up and handle all stations in the kitchen in daily operations.
Ensure freshness of ingredients.
Check and prepare sufficient mise-en-place before meal period.
Cook food items accurately to standard recipes.
Plate food items according to standard presentation style.
Assist in creating and preparing menu items and daily specials.
Inspect and clean the kitchen, kitchen equipment and serving areas to ensure safe and sanitary food handling practices.
Assist in monthly inventory counts and record food wastages.
Train, guide and encourage junior cooks to excel in their daily job duties; performs supervisory role.
Ensure areas of responsibilities are clean, tidy and organized.
Follow Food & Beverage Safety and Hygiene policies and procedures and ensure proper storage methods.
Report all items of interest to Back of House in charge (ie. Accidents, equipment malfunctions, menu items, problems or shortage of supplies).
Why join us
At Tipsy Collective, we offer you 4 Value Propositions we hold closely to our heart which are
Healthy Working Environment – Providing you a safe, fun, and healthy workspace while you thrive
Adaptability – Being prepared and have the agility to prepare solutions for any situations
Innovation – Coming together to brainstorm and execute great and fun ideas
Growth – Seeking new concepts and ideas to bring new experience to you
Explore Career Opportunities with us by applying now!

You can also check out the links below to see what Tipsy is up to!
https://www.tipsycollective.com/
https://www.instagram.com/TipsyCollectiveSg/
https://www.tiktok.com/@tipsycollectivesg

title: CENTRAL KITCHEN SOUS CHEF
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Preparation of Spicy Hot Pot: Prepare spicy hot pot dishes according to established recipes and standards. Ensure timely delivery of high-quality food to meet customer demands.
Team Communication and Task Assignment: Communicate effectively with the team and assign tasks to ensure efficient workflow. Provide clear instructions and guidance to team members to achieve operational objectives.
Customer Query Management: Manage customer queries in a timely and efficient manner. Address customer concerns promptly and provide excellent customer service to enhance the dining experience.
Food Preparation and Standards: Oversee food preparation to ensure adherence to established standards. Maintain food safety and hygiene standards at all times.
Assist in Other Kitchen Tasks: Provide support in other kitchen tasks as needed to maintain high standards of food quality and service. Collaborate with the kitchen team to ensure the delivery of high-quality food and service.
Kitchen Safety and Sanitation: Maintain a safe and sanitary work area in the kitchen. Follow proper hygiene practices, handle food correctly, and comply with health and safety regulations.
Other Ad-Hoc Duties: Perform other ad-hoc duties as assigned to ensure smooth operations.

Requirements:
Relevant Experience in the Food Industry: Possess relevant experience in the food industry, particularly in preparing spicy hot pot dishes.
Strong Communication Skills: Demonstrate excellent communication skills to effectively communicate with the team and handle customer queries.
Attention to Detail: Pay close attention to detail to ensure food preparation and service meet established standards.
Food Safety and Hygiene Knowledge: Have a good understanding of food safety and hygiene practices to maintain high standards of cleanliness and compliance.
Teamwork: Display a cooperative attitude and the ability to work well as part of a team to achieve common goals.

title: EXECUTIVE CHEF
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Roles & Responsibilities
Head chefs mostly work in the back-of-house. They take part in the creation of recipes and the preparation of advanced items, while assigning less complicated tasks to sous chefs and cooks. A primary duty is the continued efficiency of the kitchen and production of consistent, quality food.

Executive Chef Responsibilities
· Planning and directing food preparation and culinary activities
Cook Chinese north eastern cuisine and sichuan cuisine dishes
· Modifying menus or create new ones that meet quality standards
· Estimating food requirements and food/labor costs
Responsibilities
· Plan and direct food preparation and culinary activities
· Modify menus or create new ones that meet quality standards
· Estimate food requirements and food/labor costs
· Supervise kitchen staff’s activities
· Arrange for equipment purchases and repairs
· Recruit and manage kitchen staff
· Rectify arising problems or complaints
· Give prepared plates the “final touch”
· Perform administrative duties
· Comply with nutrition and sanitation regulations and safety standards
· Keep time and payroll records
· Maintain a positive and professional approach with coworkers and customers

Requirements
· Proven working experience as a head chef
· Excellent record of kitchen management
· Ability to spot and resolve problems efficiently
· Capable of delegating multiple tasks
· Communication and leadership skills
· Keep up with cooking trends and best practices
Can speak, read and write mandarin is an advantage.

title: Sous Chef
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
As the Chef de Partie, you will use your skills to amaze the patrons of our establishment with excellent cooking according to our Head Chef’s recipes and specifications, and your work will be an important factor to our customers’ satisfaction.

In your role, you will assist Head Chef with Menu planning, inventory control, scheduling, ordering of kitchen supplies, and also be a mentor to your team members, building them up with the necessary skills to bring them to the next level.

To succeed in the role, you possess a friendly disposition, good communication skills and be able to work in a team. Due to the nature of the job, you will be required to work in a shift pattern to cover early mornings and late evenings.

Requirements
· Minimum 2 years’ experience in culinary (western and local cuisine preferred)
· Food Handling Certificate (Preferred)

Performance (Soft / Core)
· Able to work well in a team setting
· Has high level of initiative, hardworking and willing to work in a fast-paced environment

title: Cook / Chef
description:

-Setting up workstations with all needed ingredients and cooking equipment
-Preparing ingredients to use in cooking (chopping and peeling vegetables, cutting meat etc.)
-Cooking food in various utensils or equipment.
-Responsible of cleanliness & upkeep of kitchen and any other ad hoc duties assigned by Sous Chef.

Staff Benefits:

title: Chef De Partie / Station Chef (Japanese)
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Brief description of the Restaurant
We are Ushidoki Wagyu Kaiseki, An authentic Beef Omakase Restaurant where you can fully enjoy head to tail and a variety of dishes in a course menu.
Leading by Chef Nobu who has more than 30 years experience and our team never compromise raising our bar to serve the best.
"A great chef is like an artist, creating a masterpiece with every dish" ---------Literally you will witness this!
We are always on the lookout for like-minded service-oriented team members joining our USHIDOKI family.
Job Descriptions
Exercise Work Safety at ALL Times in the kitchen
Observe food hygiene
Maintain the cleanliness of your workstations
To adopt First-In-First-Out method for maintaining all sundries and food items and ensure accurate stock level
To assist in the preparation and operation
Perform such other duties and responsibilities that may be assigned from time to time
Work closely with Head Chef in prepared food in accordance with restaurant standards
Assist Head Chef in ordering and purchasing of ingredients
Oversee and maintain hygiene standard
Contribute to controlling costs, improving profit margin
Any ad-hoc duties as assigned
Job Requirements
5 years of working experience at Japanese fine dining
Working hours
6days and 44 hours a week / Split shift

title: Head Chef
description:
Roles & Responsibilities
Head Chef Responsibilities:
Ensuring promptness, freshness, and quality of dishes.
Coordinating cooks' tasks.
Implementing hygiene policies and examining equipment for cleanliness.
Designing new recipes, planning menus, and selecting plate presentations.
Reviewing staffing levels to meet service, operational, and financial objectives.
Hiring and training kitchen staff, such as cooks, food preparation workers, and dishwashers.
Performing administrative tasks, taking stock of food and equipment supplies, and doing purchase orders.
Setting and monitoring performance standards for staff.
Obtaining feedback on food and service quality, and handling customer problems and complaints.
Head Chef Requirements:
Min. 2 years of culinary education.
5 years of experience in a similar position.
Experience in Japanese food.
Advanced knowledge of food professional principles and practices.
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to meet deadlines.
Available to work on-call, shifts, over weekends and on public holidays.
